movies.title: Fuse
movies.plot: In the not-so-distant future, scientists have inadvertently laid waste to millions of people. Their experiments have gone too far. Realizing the error of their ways, researchers begin developing a cure for the devastation. As civilization decays, the definitions of wealth and power begin to change. The most valuable commodity on the planet is Narcissus, the cure. Whoever has the cure has control. Whoever has the cure becomes the target. Betrayal runs rampant as the scientists try to deliver Narcissus to the people. It finds it's way into the hands of Reynaldo who has made deals and double-crossed former friends to get himself and the cure to the safe zone. With the reluctant help of Aurelia, Reynaldo is in a race against time. Narcissus is highly unstable and the research lives or dies with the only batch of the cure.
movies.simplePlot: In the not-so-distant future, a virus has wiped out parts of civilization and the only hope lies with the mysterious cure known as Narcissus.

biography.bio: Jacob Figueroa was born in Huntsville, Texas, raised in Texas, Oklahoma and Tennessee. He is an actor, known for his work in A Few Tales of Hard Times: The Name (2011), Fuse (2012), Kendall County Hunters (2012), Circles (2013) and Pornistan (2013). Jacob is also known for his writing on A Brother's Badge (2016).
biography.name: Jacob Figueroa

biography.bio: Taylor James Johnson is an actor and producer, known for Who God Created Us to Be (2012), An Irish Eye on Provence (2010) and King Lion (2012).
biography.name: Taylor James Johnson

biography.bio: Kris Kidd is a producer, known for Fuse (2012), Fan Fiction (2017) and Finnegan (2018).
biography.name: Kris Kidd

biography.bio: Corando Martinez Jr. is known for his work on 7 Kilos (2007), The Boys of Ghost Town (2009) and Fuse (2012).
biography.name: Corando Martinez Jr.

biography.bio: Stacie Reyes Kidd is an actress, known for Fuse (2012).
biography.name: Stacie Reyes Kidd

biography.bio: Joe Rios is known for his work on Now Hiring (2009), Fuse (2012) and Echo (2008).
biography.name: Joe Rios

biography.bio: Nick Sanchez is an actor and production designer, known for Fuse (2012).
biography.name: Nick Sanchez

biography.bio: Jason Daniel Scarbrough was born and raised in San Antonio,TX. He is the only son of Lee and Arleen Scarbrough and the oldest of four children. He was very active in the arts throughout childhood and was recognized early and often as a naturally gifted actor. Jason's passion for the stage earned him several awards for his acting throughout his early years and helped him land a roll in his high schools production of William Shakespeare's The Tempest. After high school, he briefly attended junior college before dropping out and joining the work force. Jason maintained his love of film and performance and in the summer of 2011, landed a small part in The Ranch Hand, a movie shot right in his home town of San Antonio. While attending a film festival, Jason was introduced to Mark Cantu, a local filmmaker. The two worked together on the award winning short film Love After and the sci-fi thriller Fuse. With the help of music video and commercial exposure, Jason landed the role of the Nightwatchman in the upcoming action/comedy Now Hiring. Jason still calls San Antonio home.
biography.name: Jason Scarbrough

biography.bio: Joshua Thomas was born in San Antonio, TX and has been a fan of acting since he was a toddler. From forcing his childhood friends to perform with him to actually starring in plays as a teenager. Joshua was finally given a video camera and his fate was sealed. He would make many home movies with his friends, and show them at parties and gatherings. He always enjoyed writing stories, and poems, but found that writing scripts was one of his favorite things to do. As he got older, he began to get serious about acting and began auditioning for short films around town and commercials. He has acted in several short films, features and commercials as well as various 48hr film competitions. He became a part of the Improv Troupe 'The Denials' for years and then proceeded to do more theater during that time. He has written a television pilot, a feature film, as well as several short films that have been produced under Frozen Fire Productions with him acting as Director on most of the projects. He moved from Texas to reside in Los Angeles, California, where he graduated from the Upright Citizen's Brigade improv school. It was in one of those classes where he met Piper Hinson and started the Youtube Channel and company Just Giggle It, they have tens of thousands of subscribers, millions of views and it is home to the series Joshua Thomas created and stars in 'Harley Quinn & The Joker VS. The Real World' where he plays The Joker, he also Directs, Writes, Edits, And Produces every episode of the series. Although he wears many hats, he does that because he wants the show to be made and with a limited budget, that is what needs to be done, but he primarily focuses on acting and writing outside of Just Giggle It.
biography.name: Joshua Thomas

biography.bio: Alejandro Vargas-Lugo is known for his work on Fuse (2012), The Peaceful Warrior (2015) and Among Thieves.
biography.name: Alejandro Vargas-Lugo
